channel.title: Umatilla County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Umatilla County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-11 North at Stateline Road - Leaving Oregon
item.description: OR-11 North at Stateline Road in Umatilla County. Stateline Road parallels the Oregon-Washington border. Oregon Thanks You - Come Back Soon.

item.title: OR-11 North at OR-332 West (Sunnyside Road)
item.description: OR-11 North at OR-332 West (Sunnyside Road) in Umatilla County.

item.title: OR-11 North (Main St.) at Columbia St.
item.description: OR-11 North (Main St.) at Columbia St. Turn right on Columbia St. to continue north on OR-11 to Walla Walla (WA) and Spokane (WA). Continue straight on Main St. for Old Town Freewater.

item.title: OR-11 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-11 north. Distance to Milton-Freewater and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: OR-11 North Approaching OR-204
item.description: OR-11 North Approaching OR-204 east to Weston and Elgin.

item.title: End OR-331 North at OR-11
item.description: End OR-331 North at OR-11 in Umatilla County. Turn right for OR-11 north to Milton-Freewater; turn left for OR-11 south to Pendleton.

item.title: OR-331 North at Mission Road
item.description: OR-331 North at Mission Road. Turn right for Mission Road east to Mission and Gibbon. Turn left for Mission Road west to Pendleton. Continue north on OR-331 for OR-11 to Milton-Freewater.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 234 Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-84 East Exit 234 Freeway Entrance. Use I-84 east for LaGrande. Continue west on Frontage Road for (Emigrant Springs) State Park and I-84 west to Pendleton.

item.title: Emigrant Springs State Park Road at Frontage Road
item.description: Emigrant Springs State Park Road at Frontage Road. Turn right for access to I-84 east to La Grande; left for access to I-84 west to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 at Mecham Interchange
item.description: I-84/US-30 at Mecham Interchange. Continue straight for Kamela; turn left for Mecham.

item.title: OR-331 South at Mission Road
item.description: OR-331 South at Mission Road. Turn left (east) for Misson and Gibbon; turn right (west) for Pendleton. Continue south on OR-331 for LaGrande, I-84, and the Museum-Tamastslikt Cultural Institute.

item.title: OR-331 South - Umatilla River
item.description: Bridge over Umatilla River on OR-331 south.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-331
item.description: OR-11 South at OR-331 (unsigned). Use OR-331 south (Mission Highway) to Mission and LaGrande. All I-84 truck traffic use OR-331.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-331
item.description: OR-11 South Approaching OR-331 (Mission Highway). Use Mission Highway for Mission and LaGrande. I-84 traffic is encouraged to use the Mission Highway instead of going through Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching Adams Jct.
item.description: OR-11 South approaching Adams Jct.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-334 and Banister Road
item.description: OR-11 South approaching (OR-334) west to Athena, and Banister Road east to Weston.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching Athena Jct.
item.description: OR-11 South Approaching Athena Jct (unsigned OR-334).

item.title: OR-11 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-11 south. Distance to Weston and Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-332
item.description: OR-11 south at OR-332 west in Umatilla County.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-332
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-332 in Umatilla County. OR-332 was recently signed as a state highway. In prior years this was just known as the Sunnyside-Umapine Highway #332, but without any route markers.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-332
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-332 to Sunnyside and Umapine.

item.title: OR-11 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-11 south at the Washington-Oregon state line. Also the first speed limit sign in Oregon is in the background - 55 MPH. Most Oregon speed limit signs omit the word Limit.

item.title: US-730 East - Sand Station Rec. Area
item.description: US-730 East at Sand Station Rec. Area on the Columbia River.

item.title: US-730 East - Distance Marker (Signed as OR-730)
item.description: Distance marker on US-730 east which is incorrectly signed as OR-730. Distance to Pasco (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: US-730 East at OR-37
item.description: US-730 East at OR-37 South at Cold Springs Junction. Use OR-37 south for Holdman, Pendleton, and Warehouse Beach Recreation Area.

item.title: US-730 East Approaching OR-37
item.description: US-730 East approaching OR-37 at Cold Springs Junction.

item.title: US-730 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-730 east. Distance to Pasco (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: End OR-207 North at US-730
item.description: End OR-207 North at US-730 in Umatilla County. Turn left for US-730 west to McNary Dam and Umatilla; turn right for US-730 east to Pasco (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: End OR-207 North at US-730
item.description: End OR-207 North at US-730. Use OR-207 south for Hermiston and Heppner.

item.title: OR-207 North Approaching US-730
item.description: OR-207 North approaching US-730 in Umatilla County.

item.title: OR-207 North - Cold Springs Reservoir Jct.
item.description: OR-207 North at Punkin Center Road to Cold Springs Reservoir.

item.title: OR-207 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-207 north. Distance to Wallula (Washington) and Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: OR-207 North at US-395 - Hermiston
item.description: OR-207 North at US-395 in Hermiston. Turn left for US-395 north to Umatilla; continue straight for OR-207 North to Wallula (Washington). No destination is given for US-395 south.

item.title: OR-207 North Approaching US-395
item.description: OR-207 North approaching US-395 in Hermiston.

item.title: OR-207 North (NW 11th St.) at W. Elm Ave.
item.description: OR-207 North (NW 11th St.) at W. Elm Ave. in Hermiston. Turn right on Elm Ave. to continue north on OR-207.

item.title: OR-207 North (NW 11th St.) Approaching Elm St.
item.description: OR-207 North (NW 11th St.) Aapproaching Elm St. in Hermiston. Turn right on Elm St. to continue north on OR-207.

item.title: OR-207 North - Hermiston
item.description: Entering Hermiston on OR-207 north. Hermiston is the largest city in eastern Oregon.

item.title: OR-207 North - Hinkle Jct.
item.description: OR-207 North approaching Hinkle Jct.

item.title: OR-207 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-207 north. Distance to Hermiston and Umatilla (via US-395).

item.title: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 West
item.description: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 West in Umatilla County. Use I-84/US-30 west to Portland. Continue north on OR-207 for Hermiston, McNary Dam, and Umatilla Bridge.

item.title: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 East
item.description: OR-207 North at I-84/US-30 East. Use I-84/US-30 East to Pendleton; continue north on OR-207 for Hermiston and Boardman (via I-84/US-30 West).

item.title: OR-207 North Approaching I-84/US-30
item.description: OR-207 North approaching I-84/US-30 (Exit 182) in Umatilla County.

item.title: OR-207 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-207 north to I-84 Freeway and Hermiston.

item.title: OR-207 North at Echo Jct.
item.description: OR-207 North at Echo Jct. Turn right for Echo and Pendleton, and to continue north on the Lexington-Echo Highway #320. Continue north on OR-207 for I-84 Freeway and Hermiston. OR-207 northbound becomes the Hermiston Highway #333.

item.title: OR-207 North Approaching Echo Jct.
item.description: OR-207 North approaching Echo Jct.

item.title: OR-207 North - Umatilla County
item.description: Entering Umatilla County on OR-207 north.

item.title: I-84/US-30 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on I-84/US-30 West in Stanfield. Distance to OR 207, The Dalles, and Portland.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-37 North
item.description: US-30 west at OR-37 north to Holdman. Continue west on US-30 for Airport and I-84.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching OR-37 Jct. at Umatilla River Bridge.
item.description: US-30 West approaching OR-37 Jct. crossing the Umatilla River bridge.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South at US-30/OR-11 Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South at US-30/OR-11 Split in Pendleton. Turn left for OR-11 south to I-84/US-395 to Portland and La Grande. Continue straight for US-30 West to City Center.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South - I-84 West Next Left
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South approaching US-30/OR-11 Split in Pendleton. Turn left for I-84 West to Portland.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-11 South (Court St.) at US-30/OR-11 Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-11 South (Court St.) at US-30/OR-11 split in Pendleton.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-11
item.description: US-30 West at OR-11. Use OR-11 north for Milton-Freewater and Walla Walla (Washington). Continue west on US-30 for City Center and Information Center. OR-11 south joins US-30 west for a short distance through Pendleton.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching OR-11
item.description: US-30 West approaching OR-11 North in Pendleton.

item.title: Kusi Road at OR-331
item.description: Kusi Road at OR-331. Turn left on OR-331 for I-84.

item.title: Kusi Road at OR-331
item.description: Kusi Road at OR-331. Turn left on OR-331 for I-84.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-207
item.description: US-395 south at OR-207 in Hermiston.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-207
item.description: US-395 South approaching OR-207 in Hermiston. Use OR-207 south for Heppner; OR-207 north for Walla Walla (Washington).

item.title: US-395 South Approaching OR-207
item.description: US-395 South approaching OR-207 in Hermiston.

item.title: US-395 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-395 south. Distance to Hermiston and Stanfield.

item.title: US-730 East/US-395 South at US-730/US-395 Split
item.description: US-730 East/US-395 South at US-730/US-395 Split in Umatilla. Merge right to continue south on US-395 to Hermiston and Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 East Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730
item.description: I-82 East Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730 in Umatilla. Turn left for US-730 East/US-395 South/McNary Dam/Hermiston.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 1 Offramp
item.description: I-82 East - Exit 1 Offramp in Umatilla. Turn right for US-730 West/Umatilla/Weigh Station. Turn left for US-730 East/US-395 South/McNary Dam/Hermiston. US-395 leaves I-82 eastbound here.

item.title: I-84 - Exit 228 Onramp
item.description: I-84 - Exit 228 onramp. Use I-84 west to Pendleton; I-84 east to La Grande.

item.title: I-84 - Exit 228 Onramp
item.description: I-84 - Exit 228 onramp. Use I-84 west to Pendleton; I-84 east to La Grande. The I-84 shield has the text OREGON in it, although it does not fit well with the rest of the font. This is the first time in the last 20 years I have lived in the northwest that I have seen an interstate shield with the text OREGON in it.

item.title: I-84 - Exit 228 Onramp
item.description: I-84 - Exit 228 onramp. Use I-84 west to Pendleton; I-84 east to La Grande. The I-84 shield has the text OREGON in it, although it does not fit well with the rest of the font. This is the first time in the last 20 years I have lived in the northwest that I have seen an interstate shield with the text OREGON in it.

item.title: Begin OR-11 North at I-84
item.description: Begin OR-11 north at I-84 onramp. Turn right for I-84 east to La Grande; continue straight for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and for I-84 west onramp to Portland.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11
item.description: I-84 East Exit 210 Offramp at OR-11 junction. Turn left for OR-11 north to City Center (Pendleton) and Milton-Freewater. Turn right for ODOT office.

item.title: US-395 South at OR-74
item.description: US-395 south at OR-74. Turn right for OR-74 west to Heppner and Condon. Merge left for US-395 south to Ukiah and John Day.

item.title: US-395 Jct. at Battle Mountain State Park
item.description: US-395 junction at Battle Mountain State Park entrance road. Turn right for US-395 south to Ukiah; left for US-395 north to Pilot Rock.

item.title: End OR-244 West at US-395
item.description: End OR-244 west at US-395. Turn right for US-395 north to Pendleton. Turn left for US-395 south to Long Creek and John Day.

item.title: End OR-244 West at US-395
item.description: End OR-244 west at US-395 junction.

item.title: OR-204 East at Winn Road
item.description: OR-204 east at Winn Road. Merge right to continue on OR-204 for Tollgate, Spout Springs, and Elgin.

item.title: OR-204 East at Weston
item.description: OR-204 east at Weston. Merge left to continue on OR-204 for Tollgate and Elgin.

item.title: OR-11 South at OR-204
item.description: OR-11 South at OR-204 interchange. Use OR-204 east for Weston and Elgin.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-204
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-204. Use OR-204 east for Tollgate and Spout Springs.

item.title: OR-11 South Approaching OR-204
item.description: OR-11 South approaching OR-204. Use OR-204 east for Weston and Elgin.

item.title: OR-11 - Milton-Freewater
item.description: Columbia St. south approaching Main St. in Milton-Freewater. OR-11 turns left onto S. Main St. towards Pendleton.

item.title: OR-11 South at Sunnyside Road
item.description: OR-11 south at Sunnyside Road. Turn right on Sunnyside Road for Sunnyside and Umapine.

item.title: OR-11 South - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-11 south at the Washington-Oregon state line. Also the first speed limit sign in Oregon is in the background - 55 MPH. Most Oregon speed limit signs omit the word Limit.

item.title: I-84 East - Umatilla Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering the Umatilla Indian Reservation on I-84 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 209 - US-395 South/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stansfield.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 207 - US-30/Airport/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District. US-30 leaves I-84 here, serving as the Pendleton business loop. US-30 rejoins I-84 on the east side of Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 199
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 199 - Stage Gulch/Yoakum Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 198
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 198 - Lorenzen Road/McClintock Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 188
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 188 - US-395 North/Stanfield/Echo. US-395 south joins I-84/US-30 east to Pendleton.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 182
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 182 - OR-207/Hermiston/Lexington.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 180
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 180 - Westland Road/Hermiston.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 180
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 180 - Westland Road/Hermiston.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 179 - I-82 West/Hermiston/Umatilla. I-84/US-30 continues east towards Pendleton and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 179 (I-82 West). Use I-82 west for Kennewick (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Umatilla County
item.description: Entering Umatilla County on I-84 east.

item.title: Route Diagram at US-395 North/US-730 Junction
item.description: Route diagram at US-395 north/US-730 junction. US-730 heads east to Walla Walla. US-395 North joins US-730 West into Umatilla. Continue straight for McNary Dam on the Columbia River.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching US-730
item.description: US-395 north approaching US-730 to Umatilla and Walla Walla.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 202
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 202 - Barnhart Road/Airport Road. This was renamed in 2009 from Barnhart Road/Stage Gulch with the completion of a connector road to the Pendleton Airport.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 177
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 177 - Umatilla Army Depot

item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 213 - US-30/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District

item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 243 - Summit Road/Mount Emily.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 210 - OR-11/Pendleton/Milton-Freewater.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-84
item.description: US-395 north approaching I-84. Use left lane for I-84 West/US-395 North to Pasco and Spokane (both in Washington via US-395).

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 209
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 208 - US-395 South/OR-37/Pendleton/John Day. US-395 joins I-84 west to Stanfield, Oregon.

item.title: US-30 East at OR-11 (To I-84)
item.description: US-30 east at OR-11. Turn right for OR-11 south to I-84, and Portland. Continue straight for US-30 East/OR-11 North/To I-84 East/Milton Freewater/Walla Walla.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-11
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-11. Use OR-11 south to I-84 West/Portland.

item.title: US-30 East to US-395 South - Pendleton
item.description: US-30 east at Court St. - To US-395 South/John Day/Pilot Rock. Continue east on US-30 for (Pendleton) City Center and (I-84) Freeway East.

item.description: US-30 east at at OR-37 north to Holdman.

item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-37 North to Holdman.

item.title: US-30 East at Pendleton Airport Jct.
item.description: US-30 east at Airport Road to (Pendleton) Airport and Oregon Department of Forestry unit office. Continue east on US-30 for (Blue Mountain) Community College and (Pendleton) City Center.

item.title: US-30 at I-84/US-395 Exit 207 Westbound Onramp
item.description: US-30 East at onramp to I-84/US-30 West/US-395 North to Portland (Exit 207).

item.title: US-30 at I-84/US-395 Exit 207 Onramp
item.description: US-30 east at I-84 (Exit 207) onramp. Merge right for I-84 East/US-395 South to La Grande; continue over freeway for I-84/US-30 West/US-395 North, and for (Pendleton) Airport, (Blue Mountain) Community College, and (Pendleton) City Center.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 207 Offramp at US-30 Jct
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 207 offramp. Turn left for US-30 west to (Pendleton) Airport, Blue Mountain Community College, and (Pendleton) City Center. Turn right for Justice Center.

item.description: I-84 east at Exit 207 - US-30 East/Airport/Pendleton City Center/National Historic District.

item.description: End I-82 east at I-84. Use I-84 west to Portland; I-84 east to Pendleton.

item.description: I-82 east approaching I-84. Use I-84 west to The Dalles and Hood River; use I-84 east to LaGrande and Ontario.

item.description: I-82 east approaching I-84. Use right lane for I-84 west to Portland.

item.description: US-730 east at I-82 West/US-395 Jct. Turn left for I-82 West/US-395 North to Kennewick (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: I-84 at Exit 182 - OR-207 Jct.
item.description: I-84 Exit 182 offramp at OR-207. Use OR-207 north to Hermiston, McNary Dam, and Umatilla Bridge. Use US-207 south to Lexington.

item.description: US-730 East at OR-37. Use OR-37 south for Holdman, Pendleton, and Warehouse Beach Recreation Area.

item.title: US-730 West - Speed 55
item.description: US-730 West - Speed 55 in Umatilla County. This is a standard type of speed limit sign in Oregon, especially on two lane highways. The idea is that only the world Speed (and not limit) invokes the Oregon Basic Speed Law instead of a hard and fast limit.

item.title: US-730 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-730 west at the Oregon-Washington state line. The Columbia River is to the right side of the photo.
